item.description:
April's event will be a SATURDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: SF Awards Season
Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: SF Awards Season
Both the final Nebula and Hugo ballots have been announced recently. Do you pay attention to SF Awards? Are there others you like? Or is it just like the Oscars where nothing you like ever wins?

5:00 Break

Open discussion. What would you like to talk about next?

6:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers April Meetup
